risk_summary.recommendation: DO NOT INSTALL - Significant security threats detected

top_issues.title: Known malicious IP: 91.92.242.30
top_issues.description: C2 server used in ClawHavoc campaign to host dropper payloads
top_issues.reason: IP identified in published security research on OpenClaw exploitation campaigns (Feb 2026)

top_issues.title: Known malicious IP: 54.91.154.110
top_issues.description: Reverse shell callback endpoint (AuthTool campaign, port 13338)
top_issues.reason: IP identified in published security research on OpenClaw exploitation campaigns (Feb 2026)

top_issues.title: Known malicious domain: socifiapp.com
top_issues.description: Exfiltration endpoint used in ClawHavoc campaign for stolen credentials
top_issues.reason: Domain identified in published IOC list from enterprise security advisory (Feb 2026)

top_issues.title: Known malicious domain: webhook.site/358866c4
top_issues.description: Specific malicious webhook instance used for credential theft
top_issues.reason: Domain identified in published IOC list from enterprise security advisory (Feb 2026)

top_issues.title: Access to .clawdbot/.env credentials file
top_issues.description: Direct access to ~/.clawdbot/.env which stores API keys (OpenAI, Anthropic, AWS) in plaintext. This is the primary credential exfiltration target in observed attack campaigns.
top_issues.reason: ~/.clawdbot/.env is the #1 exfiltration target per published enterprise security advisory

findings.title: Obfuscated eval() call
findings.description: eval() with encoding/decoding function - classic malware deobfuscation pattern

findings.title: macOS Gatekeeper bypass (xattr clear)
findings.description: xattr attribute clearing bypasses macOS Gatekeeper quarantine. This is the delivery pattern used by AMOS Stealer in malicious ClawHub skills. Detection rule: PHASR.Xattr.AttributesCleared.
findings.reason: Gatekeeper bypass is a known AMOS Stealer delivery technique observed in ClawHub attacks

findings.title: macOS Gatekeeper bypass (xattr clear)
findings.description: xattr attribute clearing bypasses macOS Gatekeeper quarantine. This is the delivery pattern used by AMOS Stealer in malicious ClawHub skills. Detection rule: PHASR.Xattr.AttributesCleared.
findings.reason: Gatekeeper bypass is a known AMOS Stealer delivery technique observed in ClawHub attacks

findings.title: macOS Gatekeeper disabled system-wide
findings.description: spctl --master-disable turns off Gatekeeper entirely, allowing any unsigned binary to run
findings.reason: Gatekeeper bypass is a known AMOS Stealer delivery technique observed in ClawHub attacks
